Title: Arena Slugcats Configurator
Description:
Allows you to choose which slugcats you can get when choosing the random option on arena mode.

And also:
-You can allow the Saint to throw spears
-Balance the artificer
-You can allow the hunter to pickup stuck spears
-Make the Gourmand generate items adapted to Arena mode
-You can have random slugcats every single round

(You still need to unlock slugcats)
